meanings.definition: A type of vehicle equipped with a turbocharged engine for increased power and performance.
meanings.sent1: The turbocars raced down the track with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: I dream of owning one of those powerful turbocars one day.
meanings.sent3: The turbocars in the movie seemed to have a mind of their own, zooming around corners effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like turbocars, propelling the project forward at an astonishing pace.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the turbocars roaring to life was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'turbocar', referring to multiple turbocharged cars.
meanings.sent1: We could hear the distant hum of turbocars approaching the city.
meanings.sent2: The parking lot was filled with shiny new turbocars of all colors.
meanings.sent3: The street was so quiet that the sound of the turbocars passing by was deafening.
meanings.sent4: The fleet of turbocars looked like a rainbow as they sped down the highway.
meanings.sent5: The turbocars lined up for the race, each one eager to prove its speed.
